name: The Closed Pandora's Box
description:
For this new PizzaJam I unfortunately had little time that is why the project is not completely finished but I had the ambition to make a little game platform relaxation or the goal will be to collect items. With subject of the jam "Shadow the Hedgehog" I decided to take a few winks to the original series (ring, chaos) and apply it on the theme "The Closed Pandora's Box"

Objectif :
Collect the 5 Chaos Emeralds to close the pandora's box

Gameplay:
Move left or right on different path and get chaos

Content :
All the content created during this game was made by me (3d mesh, sound, character)...

Software used:
Unreal Engine 4.20
Blender 2.79b
https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/Melody-Maker/
Audacity

Unfortunately as I said for lack of time I could not do all the desired levels there are only 9/15 and therefore only 3 chaos to recover.

It also lacks the animation of the character to move from one box to another.

And a small cinematic intro and end ...

I will do better next time :)

And thanks again to @jambes for his gamejam always so nice ...

-------------------------------

Gameplay :
Move left or right on different path to move and get emeralds 

Content : 
All the content created during this game jam was made by me ...

Software used:
Unreal Engine 4.20
Blender 2.79b
https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/Melody-Maker/
Audacity

Malheuresement comme je l'ai dit par manque de temps je n'ai pas pus faire tout les levels souhaité il n'y en as que 9/15 et donc seulement 3 chaos à récupérer.

Il manque également l'animation du personnage pour passer d'une case à l'autre.

Et une petite cinématique d'intro et de fin...

Je ferai mieux la prochaine fois :)

Et encore merci à @jambes pour ses gamejam toujours aussi sympatique...
